title: BARD - Barrel Man & The Slap Heard Round The World
itunes:title: BARD - Barrel Man & The Slap Heard Round The World
description:
Adam and Mark link up to talk about the possible legal implications of Will Smith slapping Chris Rock at the Oscars as well as a ruling in Federal Court that caught Mark's eye. 

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
content:encoded:
